how_to_measure: DC volts, red to P1 pin9/10, black to GND
notes: +12 comes in via P1 pins 9/10, then through R66 to +12V net.

how_to_measure: DC volts, red to P1 pin1/2, black to GND
notes: -12 comes in via P1 pins 1/2, then through R67 to -12V net.
R66 is series element between P1 and +12V net. If header has +12 but this doesn't, suspect R66/solder.
R67 is series element between P1 and -12V net.

where_to_probe: Any jack sleeve to P1 pins 3-8 (GND)
notes: Confirms ground network and power header soldering.
Bulk decoupling capacitor near power. Easy probe point.
Bulk decoupling for -12V. Easy probe point.
